name: FanaticBlader
description:
Game description

"Cursed Tower" to fulfill any wish.

a man who had lost all his memory and collapsed in the village.

He begins to climb the 'Cursed Tower' to restore his lost memory.

As he climbed the tower, the secrets about the tower and the reasons why his memory was erased were revealed.



-------------

Characteristics

3D Side-Scroll Action Game "Fanatic Blader"
Move across, and knock down the enemy who's blocking the player!

Easy Control
-It's very simple. Move from side to side, and when you meet an enemy, attack! Obstacles, you can go to the jump. It's so easy, right?

Different Patterns of Enemy & Obstacles
There are many patterned enemies, such as "Zombies" that suddenly rise and rush, "Axe Soldiers" that move quickly, "Hurricanes" that follow at a constant speed.
You can figure out patterns and overcome challenges with the most effective actions!

An easy and quick battle
-There's nothing difficult! Destroy all enemies that stand in your way. If you keep going, if the "Boss" appears and the "Boss" is destroyed, you will win.

Go after the boss's weakness!
-"Boss" are powerful. However, they also have a pattern. There's a boss who drops stones, and there's a boss who attacks on different distance. If you analyze and attack their patterns, you can be a "Hero", too!

May I give you a tip?
-There is an item that restores HP and increases MAX HP. If you acquire these items, the game will be easy. Find hidden items all over the place, including boxes!
